snippet: At James (Whitey) Bulger’s federal trial in Boston, Kevin Weeks turned on his onetime mentor, exchanging expletives — the first words they had spoken to each other in over 16 years.
abstract: Proceedings in trial of South Boston crime boss James (Whitey) Bulger turn ugly when key government witness Kevin Weeks and his onetime mentor Bulger exchange expletives--first words spoken to each other in over 16 years.
lead_paragraph: At James (Whitey) Bulger’s federal trial in Boston, Kevin Weeks turned on his onetime mentor, exchanging expletives — the first words they had spoken to each other in over 16 years.

headline.main: Vulgarities Fly Between Key Witness and Bulger
headline.print_headline: Vulgarities Fly Between Key Witness And Bulger
